flawed_nl_solution:
Every donut costs him $.0.2 because 2.4 divided by 12 equals <<2.4/12=0.2>>0.2
So he makes $.0.08 for every donut he sells because $1 minus $.0.2 equals 0.08
He needs to sell 1200 donuts because 96 divided by 0.08 equals <<96/0.08=1200>>1200.
He needs to buy and sell 100 dozen donuts because 1200 divided by 12 equals <<1200/12=100>>100
#### 100

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 0.8, not 0.08. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
